ruling: - If you Summon [[Armor Exe]], flip it face-down with [[Book of Moon]], and flip it face-up with [[Book of Taiyou]], it can attack because its non-attack effect was reset and because flipping it face-up with [[Book of Taiyou]] was not a Flip Summon.
- If [[Skill Drain]] is active and [[Armor Exe]] is Summoned, or if [[Skill Drain]] is activated after [[Armor Exe]] is Summoned, in both cases [[Armor Exe]] can attack the same turn it was Summoned.
- Removing a Spell Counter from [[Armor Exe]] is a cost.
